title: Touring Egypt
brief_description: Egypt, the cradle of history and culture, traces its beginning to life developed along the banks of the Nile. Visit Cairo, the Nile, Thebes, Luxor, Karnak, Valley of the Kings, Esna, Edfu, Aswan, Abu Simbel, Alexandria, Memphis, Sakkara, Sinai, Red Sea and El Alamein.
